description:
The Micro Traxion is exceptionally efficient (91%), ultralight progress capture pulley. The toothed cam grips the rope to haul or lift loads, and the sealed ball bearings allow you to harness 91% of your effort.

  • Fits ropes 8 to 11mm
  • The cam grips dirty or icy ropes and can be locked in the open position for use as a pulley
  • Sheave diameter is 25mm
  • Working load as progress capture pulley is 2.5kN
  • Breaking strength as progress capture pulley is 4kN
  • CE EN 567 and UIAA certified
name: Petzl Micro Traxion Pulley
